dependencies.description:
The aim of the decorator module it to simplify the usage of decorators
for the average programmer, and to popularize decorators by showing
various non-trivial examples.
dependencies.name: py-decorator

dependencies.description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.
dependencies.name: py-entrypoints

dependencies.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.
dependencies.name: py-hatchling

dependencies.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter
dependencies.name: py-ipykernel

dependencies.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.
dependencies.name: py-ipython

dependencies.description: Vestigial utilities from IPython
dependencies.name: py-ipython-genutils

dependencies.description: Jupyter protocol client APIs
dependencies.name: py-jupyter-client

dependencies.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.
dependencies.name: py-jupyterlab

dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-packaging

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.
dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil

dependencies.description: PyZMQ: Python bindings for zeromq.
dependencies.name: py-pyzmq

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.
dependencies.name: py-tornado

dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter
dependencies.name: py-tqdm

dependencies.description: Traitlets Python config system
dependencies.name: py-traitlets

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
GPTune is an autotuning framework that relies on multitask and transfer
learnings to help solve the underlying black-box optimization problem
using Bayesian optimization methodologies.
dependent_to.name: gptune

dependent_to.description: Python library to optimize and evaluate electrical models.
dependent_to.name: py-bluepyemodel

dependent_to.description:
Devito is a Python package to implement optimized stencil computation.
(e.g., finite differences, image processing, machine learning) from
high-level symbolic problem definitions. Devito builds on SymPy and
employs automated code generation and just-in-time compilation to
execute optimized computational kernels on several computer platforms,
including CPUs, GPUs, and clusters thereof.
dependent_to.name: py-devito

dependent_to.description:
An interactive toolkit for assembly and analysis of restriction-site
associated genomic data sets (e.g., RAD, ddRAD, GBS) for population
genetic and phylogenetic studies.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyrad

dependent_to.description:
Quickly and easily parallelize Python functions using IPython on a
cluster, supporting multiple schedulers. Optimizes IPython defaults to
handle larger clusters and simultaneous processes.
dependent_to.name: py-ipython-cluster-helper

description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.
name: py-ipyparallel

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
